snippet: Susie Wolff became the first female driver in 22 years to take part in a Formula One race weekend, but her involvement in a British Grand Prix practice session in Silverstone, England, lasted barely 20 minutes.
lead_paragraph: Susie Wolff became the first female driver in 22 years to take part in a Formula One race weekend, but her involvement in a British Grand Prix practice session in Silverstone, England, lasted barely 20 minutes.

headline.main: Female Driver’s F1 Appearance Is Brief
headline.print_headline: Female Driver’s F1 Appearance Is Brief
